bioconda.name: plannotate
bioconda.summary: Webserver and command line tool for annotating engineered plasmids.

biotools.summary: pLannotate is web server for automatically annotating engineered plasmids. pLannotate re-annotates engineered plasmids and shows you where the fragments are.

bioschemas.name: pLannotate
bioschemas.summary: pLannotate is web server for automatically annotating engineered plasmids. pLannotate re-annotates engineered plasmids and shows you where the fragments are.
